key.description: The key of the dataset as UUID

installationKey.description: The key of the installation that host the IPT

publishingOrganizationKey.description: The key of the organization that publish the dataset

networkKeys.description: Networks are collections of datasets, organized outside the Node-Organization model to serve some purpose.

doi.description: The DOI that refers to the dataset

type.description: The primary type of the dataset. Available values : OCCURRENCE, CHECKLIST, METADATA, SAMPLING_EVENT, MATERIAL_ENTITY

language.description: The language of the dataset metadata.

homepage.description: A homepage with further details on the dataset.

citation.description: Citations retrieved from this dataset's metadata documents.

contactsCitation.description: Contacts use to generate a citation.

lockedForAutoUpdate.description: This is generally used when the publisher has technical problems or limitations with their publication system.

createdBy.description: The GBIF username of the creator of the dataset.

modifiedBy.description: The GBIF username of the last user to modify the dataset.

created.description: Timestamp of when the dataset was created.

modified.description: Timestamp of when the dataset was modified.

contacts.description: A list of contacts associated with this dataset.

type.description: The type of contact, values can be: TECHNICAL_POINT_OF_CONTACT, ADMINISTRATIVE_POINT_OF_CONTACT, POINT_OF_CONTACT, ORIGINATOR, METADATA_AUTHOR, PRINCIPAL_INVESTIGATOR, AUTHOR, CONTENT_PROVIDER, CUSTODIAN_STEWARD, DISTRIBUTOR, EDITOR, OWNER, PROCESSOR, PUBLISHER, USER, PROGRAMMER, CURATOR, DATA_ADMINISTRATOR, SYSTEM_ADMINISTRATOR, HEAD_OF_DELEGATION, TEMPORARY_HEAD_OF_DELEGATION, ADDITIONAL_DELEGATE, TEMPORARY_DELEGATE, REGIONAL_NODE_REPRESENTATIVE, NODE_MANAGER, NODE_STAFF, REVIEWER

primary.description: Whether this is the primary contact for the associated entity.

userId.description: A list of user identifiers for this contact.

firstName.description: The personal name of the contact.

lastName.description: The family name of the contact.

position.description: The contact's position, job title or similar within the organization.

items.description: The contact's position, job title or similar within the organization.

email.description: Email addresses associated with this contact.

phone.description: Telephone numbers associated with this contact.

homepage.description: Homepages with further details on the contact.

organization.description: The organization (e.g. employer) associated with this contact.

address.description: Address lines other than the city, province, country andpostal code, which have their own fields.

city.description: The city or similar line of the contact's address.

province.description: The province or similar line of the contact's address.

country.description: The country or other region of the contact's address.

postalCode.description: The postal code or similar line of the contact's address.

createdBy.description: The GBIF username of the creator of the contact

modifiedBy.description: The GBIF username of the last user to modify the contact

created.description: Timestamp of when the contact was created

modified.description: Timestamp of when the contact was last modified

endpoints.description: A list of endpoints associated with this dataset.

type.description: endpoint type, cam be: EML, FEED, WFS, WMS, TCS_RDF, TCS_XML, DWC_ARCHIVE, DIGIR, DIGIR_MANIS, TAPIR, BIOCASE, BIOCASE_XML_ARCHIVE, OAI_PMH, COLDP, CAMTRAP_DP, OTHER

createdBy.description: The GBIF username of the creator of the endpoint

modifiedBy.description: The GBIF username of the last user to modify the endpoint

created.description: Timestamp of when the endpoint was created

modified.description: Timestamp of when the endpoint was last modified

machineTags.description: Machine tags applied to the endpoint
A list of machine tags associated with this publishing organization.

namespace.description: The namespace for the machine tag.

name.description: The name (within the namespace) of the machine tag.

value.description: The value of the machine tag.

createdBy.description: The GBIF username of the creator of the machine tag.

created.description: Timestamp of when the machine tag was created.

tags.description: A list of tags associated with this dataset.

createdBy.description: The GBIF username of the creator of the tag

created.description: Timestamp of when the tag was created

comments.description: A list of comments associated with this dataset.

bibliographicCitations.description: Citations retrieved from this dataset's metadata documents.

curatorialUnits.description: Curatorial unit information retrieved from this dataset's metadata documents.

taxonomicCoverages.description: Taxonomic coverage information retrieved from this dataset's metadata documents.

geographicCoverages.description: Geographic coverage description retrieved from this dataset's metadata documents.

temporalCoverages.description: Temporal coverage information retrieved from this dataset's metadata documents.

keywordCollections.description: Keyword collections retrieved from this dataset's metadata documents.

countryCoverage.description: Country coverage information retrieved from this dataset's metadata documents.

collections.description: Collection information retrieved from this dataset's metadata documents.

dataDescriptions.description: Data description information retrieved from this dataset's metadata documents.

maintenanceUpdateFrequency.description: The maintenance update frequency retrieved from this dataset's metadata documents.

maintenanceChangeHistory.description: The maintenance description retrieved from this dataset's metadata documents.

license.description: The data and metadata license retrieved from this dataset's metadata documents. values can be: CC0_1_0, CC_BY_4_0, CC_BY_NC_4_0, UNSPECIFIED, UNSUPPORTED
